name: 林淑玲
objective:
本課程闡述企業經理人於財務管理中最重要的投資決策、融資決策與短期資金管理決策之基本架構與財務決策，並配合各項相關議題進行個案研討。本課程結合資訊工具、財務軟體、財金資料庫及財金資訊網站的應用，以深入淺出方式介紹財務管理之基本觀念及理論架構，以結合財務管理實務並融入財務決策研討，培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。
This course explains the basic structure and financial decisions, investment decisions, financing decisions, and short-term capital management decisions for corporate managers in financial management, and conducts case studies in conjunction with various related topics. This course combines the application of information tools, financial software, financial database and financial information website to introduce the basic concepts and theoretical framework of financial management in a simple and simple way, so as to integrate financial management practices and integrate financial decision-making seminars to cultivate both theory and practice The financial management talents. Through the study of this course, students are expected to have the ability to integrate subject knowledge and professional technology in the field of financial management, independent research capabilities, critical thinking and decision-making capabilities, and the ability to formulate and solve financial management problems.
